title: I can't log in to my GCash account. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I can‚Äôt login to GCash because it says I have an ‚Äúuntrusted connection.‚Äù What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42096140355353-I-can-t-login-to-GCash-because-it-says-I-have-an-untrusted-connection-What-do-I-do)

- [Account Secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005597526-Account-Secure)
- [I want to use GCash on another phone or device](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36302878095385-I-want-to-use-GCash-on-another-phone-or-device)
- [I lost the SIM or phone where my GCash account is registered](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006457043-I-lost-the-SIM-or-phone-where-my-GCash-account-is-registered)
- [My phone got damaged or broken and I can‚Äôt access GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36303727371289-My-phone-got-damaged-or-broken-and-I-can-t-access-GCash-What-do-I-do)

- [I see an error - ‚ÄúYour device is jailbroken or rooted.‚Äù How can I log in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38909055927577-I-see-an-error-Your-device-is-jailbroken-or-rooted-How-can-I-log-in)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/38904293949721-Logging-in-to-GCash)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you‚Äôre having issues logging in to your GCash app, read this guide to learn which login error you‚Äôre experiencing and what you can do to access your account. Rest assured your funds are safe.

Note:

If you cannot log in, don't uninstall and reinstall your GCash app.

### Identify why you‚Äôre having login issues

If you're having trouble logging in to your GCash account, select from the scenarios below so we can help you.

üëâ [I forgot my MPIN](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28984195849625-I-forgot-my-GCash-MPIN)

üëâ [I didn‚Äôt receive the OTP while trying to login](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19805310504985-I-did-not-receive-my-OTP)

üëâ [The selfie scan isn‚Äôt working](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38911220491161-The-selfie-scan-in-GCash-is-not-working-What-do-I-do)

üëâ [I want to log in with another phone or device](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36302878095385-I-want-to-use-GCash-on-another-phone-or-device)

üëâ [I lost my SIM or phone](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006457043-I-lost-the-SIM-or-phone-where-my-GCash-account-is-registered)

üëâ [I see an error saying my device is not secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910492949529-I-can-t-log-in-to-GCash-because-my-device-was-detected-as-not-secure)

üëâ [I see a prompt saying my account is on hold or restricted](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609-My-GCash-Account-was-put-on-hold-or-restricted)

üëâ [The app keeps crashing or shows a white screen](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38913561930777-The-GCash-app-keeps-crashing-or-shows-a-white-screen-when-I-login)

üëâ [I want to transact offline with GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38911689985049-I-want-to-transact-offline-with-GCash-What-do-I-do)

üëâ [Are there other ways to log in to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41329110227737-Are-there-other-ways-to-log-in-to-GCash)
